typescwipt.tsdk.desc:
Specifies the fowda path to the tssewva and `wib*.d.ts` fiwes unda a TypeScwipt instaww to use fow IntewwiSense, fow exampwe: `./node_moduwes/typescwipt/wib`.

- When specified as a wowkspace setting, `typescwipt.tsdk` awwows you to switch to use that wowkspace vewsion of TypeScwipt fow IntewwiSense with the `TypeScwipt: Sewect TypeScwipt vewsion` command.
